prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CulinaryExplorer
Title: The Evolution of Vegan Cuisine: A Global Perspective
Description: Journey through the history and transformation of vegan cuisine around the world. With input from top international chefs, we delve into the impact of plant-based diets on global food culture.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportingLife
Title: The Underappreciated Art of Chess: A Deep Dive into Strategies
Description: Explore the intricate strategies of chess and its historical significance in shaping critical thinking. Renowned chess masters share their insights and tips for beginners to advanced players.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CosmosChaser
Title: The Unseen Beauty: Dark Matter and its Role in the Universe
Description: A mind-bending journey into the enigmatic world of dark matter. Understand its role in the formation of galaxies and learn about the cutting-edge research aimed at detecting this elusive component of the Universe.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PoliticsToday
Title: The Rising Influence of Polarization: A Comparative Analysis of Global Politics
Description: Examine how political polarization is influencing world politics, reshaping ideology, and driving social change. This comprehensive analysis includes viewpoints from both conservative and liberal political scholars.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MindfulLiving
Title: The Power of Silence: Exploring the Benefits of Solitude and Mindful Meditation
Description: Dive into the world of mindfulness and explore the profound impact of silence and solitude on your mental health. Learn practical techniques to incorporate mindful meditation into your daily routine and understand its scientifically-proven benefits.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CodeCracker
Title: Unraveling the Mystery of Quantum Computing: A Beginner's Guide
Description: Dive into the fascinating world of quantum computing. Learn about the fundamental concepts, the exciting possibilities it holds for the future, and how it might change the face of technology as we know it.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: ArtisticPulse
Title: The Moving Brushstrokes of Impressionism: Capturing Life's Fleeting Moments
Description: Delve into the world of Impressionism, one of art history's most revered movements. Learn about its pioneering artists, their unique techniques, and the cultural contexts that gave birth to their masterpieces. This feature also includes an interactive gallery showcasing some of the most iconic works of the era.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GreenThumbGuru
Title: Urban Farming: Revolutionizing Food Production in Metropolitan Areas
Description: Explore the burgeoning trend of urban farming and how it's transforming food production in densely populated cities. Learn about innovative techniques, sustainability factors, and the positive impacts on local economies and community health.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptocurrencyInsider
Title: Navigating the Crypto Seas: An In-depth Analysis of Blockchain Technology and its Economic Implications
Description: Sink your teeth into the complex world of cryptocurrency and blockchain technology. This article explores the origins of digital currencies, the mechanics of blockchain, and its potential to disrupt traditional economic systems. Gain valuable insights into the economic implications and future prospects of this digital revolution.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
